Data: Khan to Warner, 2 runs loosener to begin with, full outside off and Warner has to stretch out a bit to drive that past cover
Khan to Warner, no run brings it in line with the stumps and Warner pushes it inside out down the track
Khan to Warner, 1 run was that a chance? Inside edge, the ball dipped lowo to Dhoni's right and the ball just dropped short of his glove
Khan to Ponting, no run a touch wide outside off and Ponting gets far across and shoulders arms
Khan to Ponting, no run a touch wide again and he gets across and softly pats it
Khan to Ponting, 1 run Ponting off the mark with a firm push down towards point, the fielder dives and has a shy at the batsman's end but Warner is quick
Vinay to Ponting, no run nice and straight and the ball hurries onto Ponting, clips him high on the pad but missing leg, stifled appeal
Vinay to Ponting, 1 leg bye swings it back in a bit late and he softly clips it to the on side

Vinay to Warner, 3 runs comes round the wicket but he gives him width, Warner punches it well and beats the gap at cover, Tiwary does well to chase and pull it back before the rope, not sure who Tiwary's in for
Vinay to Ponting, no run lands it outside off and he's happy to leave it alone
Vinay to Ponting, no run nearly had Ponting there! He was fishing at one on the front foot that moved away, nearly grazed the face of the bat
Vinay to Ponting, FOUR runs he overpitches on middle and leg and Ponting shows the full face of the bat and merely pushes it through the line past mid-on
Khan to Warner, 1 run a bit too straight and Warner easily tucks it in front of midwicket
Khan to Ponting, no run Lands it on a good length outside off and gets it to shape away, once again induces a false shot, beaten on the drive
Khan to Ponting, no run goes back at the crease and slices it down towards point
Khan to Ponting, no run nips it back inwards and he gets across his stumps and clips it towards midwicket
Khan to Ponting, no run sliced off the back foot but straight to Rohit at short point, he's there in a catching position
Khan to Ponting, 1 run fuller and angling in and Ponting clips it down to midwcket

Vinay to Ponting, OUT the opening experiment fails for Ponting, Vinay does well to pitch it up on the off stump, moves it away slightly, Ponting drives inside out and spoons it Kohli at point, Ponting looked at bit awkward at the crease when he played that and the follow through too
Vinay to Clarke, no run keeps it on the off stump and he defends down the track
Vinay to Clarke, no run gets back at the crease and he defends to the off side
Vinay to Clarke, 1 run clipped away off the pads and well stopped at midwicket, Jadeja the man, India's have been sprightly in the field today
Vinay to Warner, 1 wide comes round the wicket and sprays it wide down the leg side
Vinay to Warner, (no ball) now it's an overstep! Oh well, Warner pats it square on the off side
Vinay to Warner, no run Free Hot, oh excellent ball! Swinging in and landing on the blockhole near the leg stump, Warner edges it onto his pads, doesn't cost a thing
Vinay to Warner, no run keeps it outside off and Warner watchfully leaves it alone
Khan to Clarke, no run lands it on middle and off and he defends with soft hands down the track
Khan to Clarke, no run punched off the front foot and well fielded at cover by Raina

Khan to Clarke, FOUR runs elegantly clipped by Clarke, he fetches it from the off stump, takes a pace forward and chips that over midwicket, Kohli makes a good attempt to slide and cut that off but the ball rolls back to the rope
Khan to Clarke, FOUR runs fullish in length on the off stump and he drives through the line, the ball is just wide of the non-strike and well wide of mid-off
Khan to Clarke, 2 runs nearly three out of three, Zaheer gives him width and Clarke slices it wide of point, Vinay has a lot of ground to cover from third man but he times the slide well
Khan to Clarke, no run gets behind the line and defends with soft hands
Vinay to Warner, 1 run squeezes out a full delivery to the off side
Vinay to Clarke, no run keeps it a shade outside the off stump and he leaves it alone
Vinay to Clarke, 2 runs a bit too straight and he shuffles and clips him behind square on the on side
Vinay to Clarke, FOUR runs too wide and on a good length, not the best way to bowl on this placid surface, Clarke reaches out and thrashes it wide of the covers
Vinay to Clarke, FOUR runs Vinay overcompensates by bowling it too full and on the pads, nice use of the wrists and he effortlessly clips it wide of midwicket
Vinay to Clarke, no run safely leaves it alone outside the off stump
Khan to Warner, no run fullish on the pads and he clips it straight to mid-on
Khan to Warner, no run gets across and knocks it down the pitch
Khan to Warner, 1 run slower delivery, he opens the face and runs it down to third man
Khan to Clarke, no run Zaheer comes round the wicket and ensures he doesn't give him room, Clarke gets behind and defends solidly
Khan to Clarke, no run slightly slower in pace and he angles it inwards, he pats it to the off side
Khan to Clarke, FOUR runs shot! It wasn't that bad a ball, short of a length on the body and at good pace, Clarke swivels and played a short-arm pull and it races past square leg
Vinay to Warner, no run ouch! Rohit dives at short point and the ball lobs off his hand and hits him flush on the side of the jaw
Vinay to Warner, FOUR runs Warner gives that a crack, punishes the width provided by Vinay, reaches out and punches it past extra cover
Vinay to Warner, no run good length outside off and steers it to the off side
Vinay to Warner, FOUR runs crisp timing from Warner, Vinay gives him width outside off and he didn't try to hit it too hard, worked it well wide of short point
Vinay to Warner, no run nips back in and he pushes it to the off side
Vinay to Warner, no run gets on the front foot and steers it to the off side
Khan to Clarke, no run continues round the wicket to Clarke, he punches it firmly down the track
Khan to Clarke, no run steers it towards point and tells his partner to wait
Khan to Clarke, 1 run angles in on the pads and he shuffles and tucks him to the deep on the on side, there's protection there now
Khan to Warner, no run clips a length delivery down to midwicket and tells Clarke to wait
Khan to Warner, no run nervy moment for Warner as an inside edge hits his pads and sneaks past the stumps
Khan to Warner, 1 run clips it across the line to the on side
Vinay to Warner, no run continues round the wicket, he defends on the front foot
Vinay to Warner, no run once again he gets an inside edge to his pads

Vinay to Warner, OUT Communication Breakdown! Warner punches it down to cover point, fails to bisect the packed off side field, Rohit is sharp, he gathers and throws to the bowler's end, Clarke was away for the run and was already near the striker's end, both were running to the same end but Warner was in no-man's land as he decided to sa
Vinay to Clarke, no run Clarke stays back and defends
Vinay to Clarke, no run goes back and across and defends solidly again
Vinay to Clarke, no run fullish in length and clipped down to mid-on
Jadeja to Forrest, 1 run Run Forrest Run! Peter Forrest is off the mark in ODIs with a push to the covers
Jadeja to Clarke, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, he clips it towards midwicket
Jadeja to Forrest, no run pushed softly to the off side
Jadeja to Forrest, no run tossed up more outside off and he watchfully leaves it alone
Jadeja to Forrest, no run gets forward and drives to the off side
Jadeja to Forrest, no run pushes it down the pitch, end of a quiet over
Yadav to Clarke, no run fullish in length on middle and leg and softly clipped to mid-on
Yadav to Clarke, no run swings in late and he jams it out firmly towards cover
Yadav to Clarke, no run fires it on the pads and he clips it straight to mid-on
Yadav to Clarke, no run Umesh has been bowling in the mid-140s, comes forward and pushes a full delivery to mid-off
Yadav to Clarke, no run jams out a full delivery down to mid-on
Yadav to Clarke, no run punched off the front foot and he can't beat the packed off-side field, 149.9 kph
Jadeja to Forrest, no run
Jadeja to Forrest, no run cuts it down to cover point
Jadeja to Forrest, 1 run chips down the track and pushes it wide of mid-off
Jadeja to Clarke, 2 runs shuffles and clips it down to deep square leg
Jadeja to Clarke, no run slower through the air and defended with soft hands
Jadeja to Clarke, 1 run comes down the pitch and nearly yorks himself, flicks it late to the on side
Yadav to Clarke, 1 run good length on the off stump and he slices it down to point
Yadav to Forrest, no run stands a bit wide of the leg stump, Forrest nicely punches it but straight to the off side ring
Yadav to Forrest, FOUR runs shot! Fractionally short, Forrest had a hint of width to work with outside off, he went forward, bent his knee slightly and square cut it wide of the diving point fielder
Yadav to Forrest, no run that was quick, at 150, he stays back and defends
Yadav to Forrest, 1 run this one kicked up a bit and caught him off guard, manages to fend it away
Yadav to Clarke, 2 runs 148 kph, swings it in and bowls full, he clips it wide of mid-on and the fielder dives and cuts it off
Jadeja to Forrest, no run gets forward and pushes it to the off side

Jadeja to Forrest, SIX runs you couldn't hear the sound of bat on ball, that was how crisp that was, chips down the track and he lofts it over the sightscreen, that was one of the cleaner hits over the sightscreen says Ian Chappell. The straight boundaries are long here
Jadeja to Forrest, 1 run he drives it wide of mid-off
Jadeja to Clarke, 1 run stays back and he clips it behind square
Jadeja to Forrest, no run gets forward and defends to the off side
Jadeja to Forrest, no run stays back and defends
Yadav to Clarke, 1 run 148 kph, on a good length and he stays back and defends to the off side
Yadav to Forrest, no run 149 kph, pace like fire, hurries him on the back foot to defend
Yadav to Forrest, no run 148 kph, fuller in length and he pushes it on the front foot towards mid-off
Yadav to Forrest, no run slower ball and Forrest clips it to midwicket
Yadav to Forrest, no run that was a real fizzer at 149 kph, Forrest did extremely well to bend his knee and sway out of the way
Yadav to Forrest, no run 148 kph, he stays back and pushes this one to cover
Ashwin to Clarke, 1 run comes round the wicket, Clarke clips it just past midwicket
Ashwin to Forrest, 1 run tossed up outside off and he pushes it through the line at mid-off
Ashwin to Clarke, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg and he clips it behind square
Ashwin to Forrest, no run gets forward and defends with soft hands
Ashwin to Forrest, no run takes a pace down the track, checks his shot and defends
Ashwin to Forrest, no run tossed up on middle and leg, he works it to midwicket
Yadav to Clarke, no run stays back at the crease and he defends down the track
Yadav to Clarke, no run stays back at the crease and thumps it firmly but can't beat point
Yadav to Clarke, 1 run goes back at the crease and cuts it down to sweeper cover
Yadav to Forrest, 1 run 145 kph, tucks it off his pads and beats midwicket

Yadav to Clarke, OUT not sure what Clarke was trying to do but full credit to the bowler for this, he saw Clarke making room and taking a few paces down and cleverly slipped in a slower ball at 121 kph, Clarke had to change his shot and tap it away with soft hands, had to really stretch out and he ended up chopping it onto his stumps
Yadav to Hussey, 1 wide Yadav runs in from round the wicket but doesn't bang it in short, slides it down the leg side at 146kph
Yadav to Hussey, 1 run 149.9kph, drifts on the body and he shuffles and clips him down to short square leg
Ashwin to Hussey, no run beats him in flight and clips his pads and he appeals, but he 's bowling round the wicket
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run
Ashwin to Forrest, FOUR runs lovely shot! Twinkle-toes Forrest emulates Clarke by chipping down the track and driving crisply past mid-off and cover
Ashwin to Forrest, FOUR runs now he goes on the back foot, goes forward and adjusts quickly on seeing the shorter length, cuts past point and finds the gap with precision
Ashwin to Forrest, 1 run tossed up and he pushes it down to long-on
Ashwin to Hussey, no run stays back and defends
Yadav to Forrest, 1 run 151 kph, Forrest chops it to the off side and charges off, tip and run, excellent running
Yadav to Hussey, 1 run continues round the wicket, sprays it on the pads and he clips it behind square on the on side
Yadav to Forrest, no run 148.9 kph, bowls it nice and straight and he ensures he doesn't give him room, clipped to short midwicket
Yadav to Forrest, no run another quick one on the body and he clips it down to short midwicket again
Yadav to Forrest, no run 145 kph, fuller in length and he stays back to defend
Yadav to Forrest, no run very good stuff from Yadav, good length and straight, tucks him up for room as he defends
Jadeja to Hussey, no run tossed up on middle and leg, he pushes it down to the off side
Jadeja to Hussey, 2 runs punches it wide of long-off
Jadeja to Hussey, no run drives and Jadeja does well to dive and deflect it
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run

Jadeja to Forrest, FOUR runs Forrest continues to impress against the spinners, he rocks back on seeing the shorter length, thumps it past two bemused fielders at cover and the two fielders at the deep gave up as well
Jadeja to Forrest, 1 run drives him to long-off
Yadav to Forrest, no run this one really kicks up on him, he stays back and fends it off to the off side
Yadav to Forrest, 1 run short and wide and he cuts it down to sweeper cover
Yadav to Hussey, 1 run 149 kph, he thrashes it to the off side again, short and wide
Yadav to Forrest, no run slower ball on the pads and he tries to run it round the corner, the keeper picks it up
Yadav to Forrest, 1 run driven towards mid-on and he has to hurry because an alert Vinay Kumar dived forward and hit the stumps with the flick
Yadav to Hussey, no run
Ashwin to Forrest, no run drives towards mid-off
Ashwin to Forrest, no run
Ashwin to Forrest, no run tossed up and he worked it across the line to the on side
Ashwin to Forrest, 1 run chips down the track and checks his shot to mid-off
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run comes down the track and he pushes it down to long-on
Ashwin to Forrest, 1 run gets on his knee and whips it to the on side and the ball drops short of Raina at midwicket
Jadeja to Forrest, no run makes room and ends up chopping it down the track
Jadeja to Forrest, 2 runs swipes it across the line down to deep square leg
Jadeja to Forrest, 1 run tossed up and he pushes it down to long-on
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run waits for the ball to come on to him before working it away down to mid-on
Jadeja to Forrest, 1 run short outside off and Forrest chops it to long-off
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run tossed up and he drives to sweeper cover
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run tossed up and he flicks it down to midwicket
Ashwin to Forrest, no run
Ashwin to Forrest, 1 run chips down the track and he clips it down to long-on
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run length ball and pushes it down to long-on
Ashwin to Forrest, no run punches it down to the on side
Ashwin to Forrest, no run chips down the track and Ashwin fields
Jadeja to Hussey, no run stays back and cuts it down to point
Jadeja to Hussey, no run drives straight to extra cover
Jadeja to Hussey, no run tossed up outside off and he defends forward
Jadeja to Hussey, no run stays back and clips it towards midwicket
Jadeja to Hussey, no run
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run clips it behind square for a single
Ashwin to Hussey, no run tries to pull but fails to make proper contact
Ashwin to Hussey, FOUR runs take that! After missing out on the previous ball, he rocks back and clubs a short delivery over square leg, the umpire had to take cover
Ashwin to Hussey, FOUR runs chips down the track to a flighted delivery and lofts it over midwicket, there was a fielder patrolling the area but it was wide of him
Ashwin to Hussey, FOUR runs Hussey in sublime touch! He fetches a ball from the off stump, gets on his knee and slogs cleanly over square leg and nearly fetches the maximum
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run cuts it down to point
Ashwin to Forrest, no run chops it back to the bowler
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run stays back and punches it to mid-off
Jadeja to Forrest, no run
Jadeja to Forrest, 1 run a bit short, he goes back and cuts
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run gets forward and turns it down to square leg
Jadeja to Forrest, no run gets forward and drives down the track
Jadeja to Forrest, no run goes back at the crease and punches it down the track
Ashwin to Hussey, no run flighted on the stumps and he clips it down to midwicket
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run pushes it wide of point for a single
Ashwin to Forrest, 2 runs pushes it down to swepeer cover and he puts pressure on the fielder for the second run
Ashwin to Forrest, 1 run goes back and cuts it behind point
Ashwin to Hussey, 2 runs extra turn and he gently nudges it down to fine leg
Ashwin to Hussey, no run appeal for a run-out at the bowler's end but Forrest is safe, he was sent bac, Dhoni gathered and threw it to Ashwin, the 3rd umpire takes a look
Jadeja to Forrest, no run
Jadeja to Forrest, 1 run goes back and punches it to long-off
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run goes back and punches it to long-off
Jadeja to Forrest, 1 run comes down the pitch and drives through the line to long-off
Jadeja to Hussey, no run forces it down the pitch back to the bowler
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run keeps the long-off fielder busy again, he comes forward and drives through the line
Rohit Sharma to Hussey, 1 run Rohit drops it a bit short and he rocks back and cuts to the deep on the off side
Rohit Sharma to Forrest, 1 run shuffles and he works it with the turn down to fine leg
Rohit Sharma to Hussey, 1 run he drops it too short and he pulls off the front foot to deep square leg
Rohit Sharma to Forrest, 1 run forces it down to long-on
Rohit Sharma to Hussey, 1 run chips down the track and he pushes it down to long-on
Rohit Sharma to Forrest, no run tries to pull him down to fine leg but fails to make proper contact
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run on the off stump and he opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
Vinay to Forrest, 1 run gives him width and Forrest goes to 49 with a cut towards deep point
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run nicely flicked away by Hussey just wide of mid-on for a single
Vinay to Forrest, no run tries to steer that past point but Rohit is alert in that position as he dives and saves a single
Vinay to Forrest, no run steered straight to point again
Vinay to Forrest, 1 run punched off the back foot past mid-off and that's Forrest's debut 50! Clarke was correct about this guy
Rohit Sharma to Forrest, 1 run chips down the track and drives him down towards long-off
Rohit Sharma to Hussey, 2 runs makes a bit of room and slices it wide of point and down to third man
Rohit Sharma to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg and he pushes it down to long-on
Rohit Sharma to Forrest, SIX runs the long straight boundaries don't deter Forrest, tossed up outside off and he chips down the track and has a free swing over wide long-off
Rohit Sharma to Forrest, no run pushes it back to the bowler
Rohit Sharma to Forrest, no run
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run full on middle and leg and pushed to long-on
Ashwin to Forrest, no run drills it back to the bowler
Ashwin to Forrest, 1 run punched down to long-on
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run waits for the turn and clips it down to short fine leg
Ashwin to Forrest, 1 run gets forward and drives inside out down to long-off
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run takes a single down to long-on, they're setting themselves up for the Powerplay here
Khan to Hussey, 2 runs Zaheer comes round the wicket and drifts on the pads and he clips it down to fine leg
Khan to Hussey, no run Zaheer tries to mix things up by bowling closer to the stumps, there's a sound as the ball passes Hussey, Dhoni takes it on the full and there's an appeal
Khan to Hussey, no run nearly chops it back onto the stumps, Zaheer gets the ball to nip back in
Khan to Hussey, 1 run cuts it down to gully for a single
Khan to Forrest, 2 runs goes across the stumps and chips it in the air and just manages to clear midwicket
Khan to Forrest, 1 run slower ball and he pushes it down to long-off
Yadav to Forrest, FOUR runs 144 kph, he drops it short and wide and Forrest rolls his wrists and slaps it wide of point
Yadav to Forrest, no run good comeback by Yadav as he gets it to come back in and cramps him for room, he pushes it down the track

Yadav to Forrest, OUT miscued! Forrest tries to push it in the Powerplay, pulls a short delivery and fails to control it, Vinay runs forward from deep square leg and takes it, that ends a very impressive debut innings by Forrest
Yadav to Hussey, 2 runs short and wide and he cuts him hard down to deep point for a couple
Yadav to Hussey, no run full delivery and he clips it down to midwicket
Yadav to Hussey, no run short and wide again and he cuts but can't beat point
Khan to Christian, 2 runs drifts on the pads and he clips him down to fine leg for a single
Khan to Christian, no run angles in on the pads and he stays back and defends
Khan to Christian, 1 run stays beside the line and he places it down to cover point
Khan to Hussey, 1 run Hussey squirts out a full delivery on the pads down to mid-on an brings up his fifty!
Khan to Christian, 1 run drops it short and he's ready for the pull, places it along the ground to the on side
Khan to Hussey, 1 run punches it down to Ashwin at long-off to keep the strike
Yadav to Hussey, 2 runs Yadav gives him a bit of width and he opens the face and dabs it down to third man
Yadav to Hussey, 1 run full outside off and he drives wide of cover for a single
Yadav to Christian, FOUR runs streaky boundary by Christain as he gets an inside edge that sneaks past the stumps and beats short fine leg
Yadav to Christian, no run nice comeback by Yadav as he sprays in the yorker and Christian does well to dig it out
Yadav to Christian, 1 run fullish delivery outside off and he places it wide of extra cover

Yadav to Hussey, FOUR runs he thrashes a full and quick delivery wide of extra cover, Kohli sprints and gives it everything to cut it off and he nearly saves the boundary but the ball rolls back towards the rope, he appears to have hurt his ankle on the dive, splendid attempt nevertheless
Khan to Christian, 2 runs clips it wide of midwicket for a coulpe
Khan to Christian, 2 runs gets across and works it behind square for a couple
Khan to Christian, 2 runs Christian's keeping busy, clipped off the pads wide of square leg and puts pressure on Kohli by going for the second
Khan to Christian, no run gets across and mistimes the drive to cover
Khan to Christian, no run good slower ball, he shapes to pull but plays too early and misses
Khan to Christian, no run comes round the wicket, he gets across and clips it towards cover
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run nips it back inwards and he works it to the on side
Vinay to Christian, 1 run good slower ball, a bit too early on the shot and he ends up mistiming it to the on side
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run full and he drives wide of Umesh at mid-off
Vinay to Christian, no run tries to slap that to long-off and he flat -bats that back to the bowler
Vinay to Christian, 3 runs he lofts over the bowler's head and Sehwag does well to chase that from mid-on and slide and cut it off
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run drives it down to long-on
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run stays back and punches it down the track
Jadeja to Christian, no run chops it to the off side
Jadeja to Christian, 2 runs gets on his knee and paddles it down to fine leg
Jadeja to Christian, no run comes down the track and pushes it back to the bowler
Jadeja to Christian, 1 run turns it down to backward square leg for a single
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run tossed up, he drives to long-off for a single
Ashwin to Hussey, no run works it down to midwicket
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run
Ashwin to Christian, 2 runs shuffles and clips him to deep square, they run the first quickly
Ashwin to Christian, 1 run drives him through the line to long-on
Ashwin to Hussey, no run gets forward and pushes it towards point
Ashwin to Hussey, no run stabs it wide of point and they communicate well and take the single
Jadeja to Christian, 2 wide moves right across his stumps and tries to paddle it away, the ball hits Dhoni flush on the knee
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run goes back and makes room and cuts to mid-off
Jadeja to Christian, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg and he pushes it down to long-on
Jadeja to Hussey, no run stays back and cuts it down to point
Jadeja to Hussey, FOUR runs skilfully done by Hussey, he makes a bit of room and chips down the track, lofts inside out over extra cover
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run flatter delivery and he works it wide of cover
Jadeja to Christian, no run gets forward and defends to the off side
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run cuts it wide of point and Zaheer does well to cut it off and keep it down to a single
Vinay to Christian, 1 run slower ball from the back of the hand, too short as well, he fetches it from outside off and flat-bats it to deep midwicket
Vinay to Hussey, no run steers it to point and Hussey decides to head back to his crease, Rohit doesn't throw because there was nobody backing up
Vinay to Hussey, 1 run well bowled, Vinay sees the batsman making room and advancing so drops it short and on the body, Hussey uneasily pats it to cover
Vinay to Christian, 1 run fuller delivery and he squirts it wide of cover
Vinay to Hussey, no run Hussey goes for a wild swish outside off but plays too early and misses
Khan to Christian, 1 run Zaheer too drops it short on seeing the batsman advance, he tucks it to the on side and has to settle for a single

Khan to Hussey, OUT good reflexes from Sehwag! Zaheer fires it full on the pads and Hussey tries to work that away past square leg with his wrists, he chips it and Sehwag at square leg has to time his dive well to his right, which he does, and takes it an inch from the ground
Khan to Wade, no run Wade watches it through to the keeper
Khan to Wade, no run gets across and drops it down the track back to the bowler
Khan to Wade, no run tries to squeeze it past the gap at point but the fielders are alert
Khan to Wade, 1 run strays on the pads and he clips it to the on side
Yadav to Wade, FOUR runs 140.7 kph, Wade gets a short, quick one rising over his face and he swivels gets a top edge over the keeper
Yadav to Wade, no run 145.7 kph, pacy one on the pads and the ball clips his pads and rolls to the on side
Yadav to Wade, 1 leg bye hurries him for pace and he mistimes it towards cover point
Yadav to Christian, FOUR runs third man was too square and Umesh fired that too full and wide, on the blockhole and Christian merely squirted it to the boundary
Yadav to Christian, no run beats him for pace with another full delivery outside off
Yadav to Christian, no run down the leg side and he shapes to pull down to fine leg and nearly gloves it to Dhoni, who appeals, it flicked his shirt
Khan to Wade, no run Wade fails to squeeze out a yorker outside off
Khan to Wade, 1 run squeezes out a yorker down to mid-on, well bowled
Khan to Christian, no run Zaheer's keeping them in check with his yorkers, he squeezes it back to the bowler
Khan to Christian, 2 runs moves across his stumps and whips a full delivery across the line to deep midwicket
Khan to Christian, no run another yorker outside off and he fails to get something out of it, excellent stuff from Zaheer
Khan to Christian, no run comes round the wicket and Zaheer mixes it up well and bangs it in short, Christian tries to slash it over third man but the bounce is too good for him
Vinay to Wade, 1 run good yorker and Wade just manages to push it past a diving Vinay who took Christian out along with him, Christain was setting off but tripped and fell as Vinay made contact
Vinay to Christian, 3 runs Christian goes across and tries to paddle it to fine leg but gets a top edge which clears Dhoni
Vinay to Wade, 1 run Wade backs away and tries to carve it over extra cover but mistimes it

Vinay to Christian, 1 run, OUT good work by Jadeja, Christian works it down to long-on and tries to put pressure on Jadeja by pushing for the second run, the throw is accurate to Dhoni and the batsman is well short, the third umpire takes a look
Vinay to Harris, 1 run drives it to the off side
Vinay to Wade, 1 run Wade makes room and tries to pierce the off side field but can't get it past Raina at point
Yadav to Wade, no run 142.5 kph, pushes a full delivery down to mid-off and Rohit takes aim at the bowler's end and misses
Yadav to Wade, 1 run Wade continues to look scratchy, swivels and tries to pull but he's beaten for pace and the bal dribbles to the on side
Yadav to Harris, 1 leg bye Harris shapes to pull and the ball hits him flush on the stomach and rolls to the off side
Yadav to Wade, 1 run Wade backs away and chops it to the off side, he's struggling
Yadav to Harris, 1 leg bye 147.7 kph, clips his pads and rolls to the leg side
Yadav to Wade, 3 runs 148 kph, forces a low full toss towards mid-off and Rohit misfields
Vinay to Wade, 2 runs comes round the wicket, Wade backs away and gets an inside edge past the stumps

Vinay to Wade, OUT Wade's scratchy knock ends, he backs away to cart that over the on side and misses a slower ball, hits the leg stump, Wade is very frustrated for not making the most of the conditions
Vinay to McKay, 1 run punches it down to sweeper cover for a single
Vinay to Harris, 1 run was he swatting a fly there? The slower bouncer, took an eternity to reach him, he made room and swatted it to the on side, mistimed it
Vinay to McKay, 2 runs makes room and lofts it wide of long-off

Vinay to McKay, OUT McKay moves right across and tries to slog him, he doesn't pick the slower ball and misses it, Harris was already off the blocks so McKay had to hurry, Dhoni correctly threw it to Vinay who flicked it at the stumps, the ball deflected off the stumps and the third umpire took a look, he was a yard short
Nevertheless, this target will test India's slippery batting line-up. Should be an absorbing chase. Join us in 30-35 minutes.
Australia will feel they should have got more, closer to 300. Hussey and Forrest laid a very good foundation for the lower order but the Indians did really well to pull things back.
Sehwag and Gambhir walk out. Harris to bowl
Harris to Gambhir, no run Gambhir chases a ball moving away wide of the off stump, bad ball and bad shot
Harris to Gambhir, no run much better, he gets across and leaves it alone to the keeper
Harris to Gambhir, no run 134.5 kph, Harris gets good carry through to the keeper, Gambhir is careful outside the off stump
Harris to Gambhir, no run goes back to being circumspect again, the width is tempting him and he chases at one rooted to the crease
Harris to Gambhir, no run gets nicely beside it this time and steers it to the off side
Harris to Gambhir, 1 run brilliance from Ponting at point to stop that, nicely punched off the back foot, looked like a boundary
Starc to Gambhir, no run clipped off the hips straight towards square leg
Starc to Gambhir, no run trapped on the pads and Starc appeals but that looked like missing the leg stump, kept a touch lower than expected
Starc to Gambhir, no run gets behind the line and defends to the off side
Starc to Gambhir, 1 run fuller in length and on middle and leg, times it nicely off the back foot and mid-on fields
Starc to Sehwag, 1 run punched off the back foot and it's in the air but Hussey did well to dive to his left, Sehwag had to scamper that single
Starc to Gambhir, FOUR runs Gambhir takes the initiative by stepping down the track and smashing it along the turf past the gap between mid-off and cover
Harris to Sehwag, FOUR runs Harris overpitches and Sehwag doesn't have to do much at all, at the crease, minimal foot movement and he got the meat of the bat behind the ball to beat cover
Harris to Sehwag, 1 wide bangs it in short down the leg side and the umpire calls it one bouncer for the over

Harris to Sehwag, FOUR runs superbly timed! A fraction short and it was moving away, he rides the bounce well, punches it crisply past a diving Hussey at point, third man was square but it was too quick for him
Harris to Sehwag, no run tries to repeat the previous shot but he's beaten
Harris to Sehwag, 1 leg bye drifts on the pads and he tucks it off his legs down to midwicket
Harris to Gambhir, 1 run angles on the pads and he rolls his wrists and places it down to fine leg
Harris to Sehwag, 2 runs lofts him over mid-off but he doesn't quite time it well enough
Starc to Gambhir, no run hurries him up for pace as he tries to work it to the on side, clips his pads and rolls away
Starc to Gambhir, no run short of a length and he nicely tucks it away straight to square leg
Starc to Gambhir, no run traps him on the pads again as he tries to whip it away to the on side but outside the line of the leg stump, Gambhir not really at ease with Starc's incoming ball
Starc to Gambhir, FOUR runs that's a good response! Short ball fetched from outside the off stump, he rode the bounce well and slapped it across the line wide of square leg
Starc to Gambhir, no run gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
Starc to Gambhir, no run
Harris to Sehwag, no run Sehwag always gives you that chance with the odd slash outside off
Harris to Sehwag, 1 run gets across and clips it down towards midwcket
Harris to Gambhir, no run gets across and taps it with soft hands to the off side
Harris to Gambhir, 1 leg bye pitches outside leg and hits his pads and rolls away to the off side, they take a leg bye
Harris to Sehwag, no run goes back and punches it down towards cover
Harris to Sehwag, no run slightly short and he punches it towards cover

Starc to Gambhir, FOUR runs crisp shot, Starc pitches up outside off and Gambhir leans onto the front foot drive and places it in the gap at cover, very well timed and a good attempt to try and pull it back
Starc to Gambhir, 1 run cuts wide of point but third man's square
Starc to Sehwag, no run goes back and punches it towards cover
Starc to Sehwag, no run gets right across his stumps but changes his shot and pushes it down towards mid-off
Starc to Sehwag, 2 runs really full and wide and Sehwag stays at the crease and slashes one-handed at third man
Starc to Sehwag, no run stays back and clips it down to mid-on
Harris to Gambhir, no run that was an absolute peach which kicked up off a good length and sneaks past his glove
Harris to Gambhir, 2 runs fuller in length and he clips it wide of midwicket
Harris to Gambhir, no run drops it with soft hands to the off side and tells Sehwag to wait
Harris to Gambhir, no run goes back at the crease and softly pats it to the off side
Harris to Gambhir, 1 run opens the face of the bat and pushes it softly towards point
Harris to Sehwag, 1 run slightly short and he arches backwards and dabs it down to third man
Starc to Sehwag, no run length ball is clubbed by Sehwag towards mid-on, on the bounce to the fielder
Starc to Sehwag, 1 run pitched up and just outside off, driven crisply towards extra cover and a sharp single is taken
Starc to Gambhir, 1 wide slants it down the leg side, Wade dives acrobatically to collect that
Starc to Gambhir, 1 run length ball on the stumps, pushed to the off side for a quick single
Starc to Sehwag, no run a slower bouncer from Starc, Sehwag was tricked by that one, he was looking to swipe it towards midwicket but didn't spot the change of pace and was easily beaten
Starc to Sehwag, no run no feet from Sehwag as he punches the ball towards cover, straight at the fielder, Gambhir initially wants one but gets back to the non-striker's end after a chorus of No's

Starc to Sehwag, FOUR runs there is a tiny gap in the crowded field around point, Sehwag manages to find it, it was a wide delivery from Starc, Sehwag lashes that for four, there a dive in the outfield but the fielder can't stop the ball
Harris to Gambhir, no run defended towards extra cover from the crease

Harris to Gambhir, no run close call for Sehwag, pitched up, on middle stump, pushed towards mid-on by Gambhir, who screamed 'No' early, Sehwag had already set off, was slow to turn, a direct hit and Sehwag was a goner
Harris to Gambhir, FOUR runs streaky from Gambhir, a shortish ball outside off, takes the edge and flies high over slip, Clarke leaps but he had no chance, four chancy runs
Harris to Gambhir, no run

Harris to Gambhir, FOUR runs lovely hit from Gambhir, a full ball is caressed past extra cover by Gambhir, timing and placement perfect, the 50 is up for India. 50 for 0 isn't a scoreline India have seen often on this tour
Harris to Gambhir, no run much shorter from Harris, Gambhir stays back and pokes the ball towards point

McKay to Sehwag, OUT the opening stand is over, Sehwag is gone, an ordinary delivery from McKay, short of length ball that was slanting down the leg side, should have been easily helped away, instead Sehwag closes the face too early, leading edge results, and the ball pops up for a simple catch to point, a sign of the poor form he is in
McKay to Kohli, no run a length ball on the stumps, carefully defended to the off side
McKay to Kohli, no run blocked off the front foot to the left of the bowler
McKay to Kohli, no run length ball outside off, left alone by Kohli
McKay to Kohli, no run short of length ball just outside off, defended from the crease by Kohli
McKay to Kohli, no run length ball on off stump, punched confidently towards mid-on
Harris to Gambhir, no run fullish delivery outside off and he defends to the off side
Harris to Gambhir, no run drops it with soft hands to the off side and thinks of a single
Harris to Gambhir, 1 run excellent calling and running this time, Kohli knew as soon as Gambhir dropped it behind the pitch that there was a single for the taking
Harris to Kohli, 1 run spooned in the air and it flies past the vacant gully region
Harris to Gambhir, 3 runs seemed risky at first, Gambhir knew there was just a slip in place so he edged that deliberately where a third slip would have been, third man does well to cut it off
Harris to Kohli, no run drifts on the pads and he closes the face of the bat and clips it to square leg
McKay to Gambhir, 1 run full outside off and he steers it down to third man
McKay to Kohli, no run nicely punched off the back foot straight to short extra cover
McKay to Kohli, no run shuffles across and nicely clips it away down to square leg, good shots but straight to the fielders
McKay to Kohli, 1 run drops it with soft hands to the off side and sets off quickly
McKay to Gambhir, no run clips him down to square leg
McKay to Gambhir, no run gives him a bit of width and he chops that down to point
Starc to Kohli, no run Kohli gets excited seeing that width but the ball is pitched up and he nearly feathers an outside edge to the keeper
Starc to Kohli, no run full and swinging in, he clips it off the toe of the bat down to mid-on
Starc to Kohli, 1 run they're doing the singles well, quick shuffle and clip towards mid-on and he calls quickly
Starc to Gambhir, 1 run another quick single, Gambhir clips a full delivery across the line towards midwicket and Kohli was off the blocks
Starc to Kohli, no run fullish in length outside off and he drives straight to mid-off, can't beat the fielder
Starc to Kohli, no run drops it towards mid-off and sets off but Gambhir wisely stays put, Warner fails to gather and ends up colliding with Gambhir on the move
Christian to Gambhir, 1 run comes round the wicket and gives him width, he cuts to deep point
Christian to Kohli, no run good length outside off and he punches it down to point
Christian to Kohli, no run gets beside the line and punches it down to point
Christian to Kohli, 1 run good length on middle and leg and he clips him down towards square leg

Christian to Kohli, 1 run opens the face of the bat and steers him down to third man

Starc to Gambhir, 1 run

Christian to Gambhir, no run Gambhir nearly falls for the trap, Clarke had placed himself at a short third man position and Gambhir dabbed it straight to him
Christian to Gambhir, no run drops it with soft hands to the off side
Christian to Gambhir, 2 runs angles on the pads and he clips him down towards fine leg
Christian to Gambhir, no run steers it down to Ponting at cover point, Ponting took a blow on the hand after that earlier misfield

McKay to Gambhir, no run punched down the pitch but straight to McKay

McKay to Gambhir, 1 run good running again, drops it in front of him and Kohli sets off

McKay to Gambhir, OUT the bowling change works! Lands it on leg, Gambhir had already shuffled across the stumps a bit and had exposed the leg stump, the ball nipped in slightly and hit his pads, the umpire reckoned that was hitting leg, on seeing the pitch map, the ball looked like pitching on the border of the leg stump line
McKay to Dhoni, no run leaves it alone to the keeper

Christian to Dhoni, no run gets it to move back in and Dhoni watchfully leaves it alone

McKay to Dhoni, no run now Dhoni tries to chase one leaving the right-hander, he's rooted to the crease and is beaten

Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run makes room and squeezes out a full and faster one down to Harris at cover point
Doherty to Jadeja, 2 runs scoops it over extra cover and Jadeja just fails to find the rope
Doherty to Dhoni, no run a dot ball! Dhoni makes room and can only slap it to extra cover
Doherty to Dhoni, no run and yet another dot ball! Dhoni thuds it right back at Doherty to his left, just four off this over
McKay to Ashwin, no run Ashwin goes right across his stumps and tries to wham it over short fine leg, close to the off stump
McKay to Ashwin, 1 run clears the front leg and mistimes the shot to midwicket, only a single!
McKay to Dhoni, SIX runs he delivers just when India needed a big hit! Stays at the crease and picks a length delivery from outside off and carts it high over wide long-on
McKay to Dhoni, (no ball) 2 runs it's a waist-high no-ball! McKay lets that slip, Dhoni clubbed that and was caught at deep square leg, the umpire called it a no-ball immediatrely

McKay to Dhoni, 3 runs India have pulled it off at the nick of time! Almost! Dhoni pulls a slower ball behind square on the on side and the fielder, I think it was Warner, dived at the boundary and cut it off but India had time to take the third
It was good fun bringing this game to you today. Thanks for the mails and the Forrest puns! Look forward to your company on Tuesday for India v Sri Lanka. Cheers!
112 meters - that was the length of that last-over six. In Adelaide Oval it's no joke.
Here's the presentation:

India beat Australia for the first time at Adelaide and it's their first win against a Clarke-led side on this tour. It's quite ironic looking back at the abuse Dhoni received when he was struggling, to the response now. Abuse to praise in 60 seconds... Here's an example:

So McKay crumbles under pressure in the final over. With 13 needed, Australia would have fancied their chances but Dhoni quietly saved his best for the last over. It was a strange old knock but in end India got home in a heart-stopper.
India won by 4 wickets (with 2 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Gautam Gambhir, INDIA
